abstract: GlacioBar, the only bar in the world made out of glacial ice, has opened in Patagonia, at the Glaciarium, a museum about the region's glaciers.
snippet: GlacioBar, the only bar in the world made out of glacial ice, has opened in Patagonia, at the Glaciarium, a museum about the region's glaciers.
lead_paragraph: The first ice bar in Patagonia, Argentina, opened last week just outside the town of El Calafate. GlacioBar, billed as the only bar in the world made out of glacial ice, is the latest addition to Glaciarium, a new science museum dedicated to the region's hundreds of glaciers.

headline.main: A Glacial Ice Bar in Patagonia
